channel.title: Comments on: Stuffed Capsicums – Cooking Class 3

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: oh yum. Stuffed capsicums are always great, and you can stuff them with whatever is left in the fridge!
item.content:encoded: oh yum. Stuffed capsicums are always great, and you can stuff them with whatever is left in the fridge!

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: These look so tasty! Perfect for the chilly weather we've been having I reckon :)

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Renee - Thanks, let me know what you think of them if you try them
Hi Audax - Thanks! :P This method is quite similar, with the addition of boiling the capsicums.
Hi Alexandra - It certainly is all good! :)
Hi Lorraine - No worries, I hope you enjoy it, it would work well with the weather in Sydney at the moment.
Hi Sara - Thanks, it is a good version and easy to change if you are missing any ingredients. Hope you like it.
Hi Jeena - Thanks, hope you like them if you try them!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Renee – Thanks, let me know what you think of them if you try them

Hi Alexandra – It certainly is all good! ðŸ™‚

Hi Sara – Thanks, it is a good version and easy to change if you are missing any ingredients. Hope you like it.

Hi Jeena – Thanks, hope you like them if you try them!

item.description: ohh I loved stuffed veggies...stuffed tomatoes...peppers...eggplant...it's all good!

item.title: By: Audax Artifex
item.dc:creator: Audax Artifex
item.description: What a beautiful blog you have the photos are so professional. I just love stuffed Capsicums I always do them in the oven I must try this method. Thanks for the nice comments you left on my blog. Cheers from Audax in Australia
